document.full_text: jurors deliberating at hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam's insider-trading trial appear to be struggling on occasions to keep track of dozens of phone taps and thousands of documents in evidence.
document.title: rajaratnam jury grapples with mound of documents
lines_and_colors: jurors deliberating at hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam's insider-trading trial appear to be struggling on occasions to keep track of dozens of phone taps and thousands of documents in evidence.
